title: Car rental agreements and reservation confirmations
dataVerified: Renter name, vehicle, pickup/return locations, dates, rate, insurance coverage
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered rental agreements (changing insurance coverage, damage waiver). Domain binding verifies rental company. Liability documentation. Damage claim evidence. Expense claim verification. Multi-page: Rental agreements multi-page with terms.
